Can we serialize static field? Explain your answer why.
Answers: Static Variable. Static variables belong to a class and not to any individual instance. The concept of serialization is concerned with the object's current state. Only data associated with a specific instance of a class is serialized, therefore static member fields are ignored during serialization.
